channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Democrat James Walkinshaw wins U.S. House special election in Virginia
item.description: Democrat James Walkinshaw, a politician with experience working on Capitol Hill, has won a special election to be the next U.S. House representative o...

item.title: Congressional Black Caucus members rip GOP's 'racist' redistricting plans
item.description: Congressional Black Caucus members on Tuesday decried redistricting efforts by Republicans as a "racist" plan that has threatened the seats of CBC law...

item.title: Court: Lisa Cook can remain Federal Reserve governor while fighting Trump's attempt to fire her
item.description: A federal court ruled Tuesday that embattled Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook can remain in her position while she fights President Donald Trump's e...

item.title: 'Not the typical case': Newsom's attempt to end Trump troop deployment turned away by judge
item.description: A federal judge put a temporary kibosh on California Gov. Gavin Newsom's attempt to shut down President Trump's troop deployment to Los Angeles.

item.title: Detroit-area city can ban LGBTQ+ pride flags on public property, judge says
item.description: A Detroit-area city that banned LGBTQ+ flags from publicly owned flagpoles did not violate the Constitution, a judge said.

item.title: Exclusive: Aliens Arrested By ICE In New Push Had Records Of Assault, Child Sex Crimes
item.description: 'The media’s vile smears demonizing ICE is leading to our officers facing a 1000% increase in assaults against them,' said Tricia McLaughlin.

item.title: How Long Will We Tolerate the Madness in Our Streets?
item.description: Decarlos Brown’s story is shocking, yet all too familiar.

item.title: Lessons from the Charlotte Horror
item.description: If this is not a case for mandated psychiatric treatment and institutionalization, then what is?

item.title: Can New Yorkers Unite Against Mamdani?
item.description: The stars are aligned against a unified front to stop a radical takeover of America’s greatest city.

item.title: Free Abortions And No Prisons: 6 Craziest Beliefs Of The Socialist Faction Infiltrating The Democrat Party
item.description: Democrats who embrace rotten DSA policies festering in their party are paving the way for a nation that would make our founders weep.

item.title: Appeals Court Upholds $83.3M Judgment Against Trump for Defaming E. Jean Carroll
item.description: While there are reasons to be skeptical of Carroll’s claims, Trump has himself to blame for the legal blunders that led to the astonishing outcome.

item.title: ICE Launches Operation Midway Blitz Targeting Chicago’s ‘Worst Of The Worst’ Criminal Aliens
item.description: DHS says the new effort is in honor of Katie Abraham, who was killed in a hit-and-run car crash earlier this year.

item.title: A Woman Is Murdered, And The Media Rush To Defend Democrats By Calling It ‘Political’
item.description: The media are so opposed to everything Trump does they're willing to watch people die.

item.title: I Need to Stop Watching These ‘Ballerina’ Movies
item.description: Why are the assassins learning to dance in this year’s John Wick spin-off? It’s not really clear.

item.title: Just 6% Of Female Gen Z Harris Voters Think Personal Success Includes Having Kids
item.description: It’s no secret that fewer and fewer Americans are having children. Gen Z women, especially, do not see children as a big measure of success.
